description:
Minami-chan and the girls are excited over the fabled ciabatta sandwich sold at the school store. They all head there, but it’s already filled with students.
Yuu-chan suggests other breads, but Minami-chan and Fuyumi-chan enters the crowd...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: In Pursuit of the Fabled Bread
À la recherche du pain fabuleux
